name: Stellar Garbage Disposer
description:
A small puzzle space shooter where you have to put space trash in the way of the bullets of a spaceship.

Controls:

  • Left click to press buttons and put space trash in the map
  • Left and Right Arrow Keys to change the current type of trash
  • "1",  "2", "3", "4" and "5" keys to quickly change the current type of trash (not from the numpad)

This was my entry for the GMTK Jam 2020. I entered alone but received the help of a lot of people (where a lot are like 10) who gave me ideas, tips and emotional support. Thanks to everyone who saw me on my stream!

Special thanks to: Icyprocyon, Karipava, Elsinero, Seyacat, ElPinaColada and all of my friends who gave me some company during the 25 hours I dedicated to this project!
